overview: Dareen has been a developer in the computer software programming field since 2002 and started her professional career as a C++ software engineer in 2006. During her early years, she spent most of her time writing algorithms and applications related to the fields of data security, artificial intelligence, and machine learning. Following that, she had two years of extensive physics and math programming, along with cutting-edge 3D games and graphics programming, and one year of J2ME mobile game/application engine development. Dareen then went on to smart-client and thick-client applications development with C++/C# and .Net Framework 4 and further enriched her skills with Flash ActionScript3 programming and PHP5, along with the MySQL Database engine. She also runs a technical blog containing the latest technology news, development tips, and sample applications, along with their source code. Currently, she works full-time as a Technology Specialist at Amman-based Softact, fulfilling the roles of Senior Software Engineer, Technical Consultant and Project Manager using Agile processes (MSF and Scrum).
